price: Hasha! Hakika maandiko ya watu wema bila ya shaka yamo katika I'liyyin.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ
footnotes: Ni hakika kuwa vitendo vya watu wema bila ya shaka vimeandikwa katika I'liyyin.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: kallā inna kitāba al-abrāri lafī ʿilliyyīna
